title: Resolution

params.attack: 1 stage higher then the target's defense.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Attack a player if they have a conflict.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> At the start of the game, you are told how many people's roles have conflict.

> A player's role has conflict if it shows up on the command =list conflict.

> Whenever a player with conflict dies, you will be told.

> This will be rerolled for free if there are no conflicting roles or if all conflicting roles are rerolled.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Resolve all conflict by seeing everyone with a conflicting role die.

desc:
Post 1333
*"So much conflict, it makes me sad. I'll be happier once I kill everyone who has ever had conflict, I'm sure of it!"*
